name: 2016.jsunconf.eu
description: The 2016 edition of the jsunconf website

scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run server
scripts.setenv: git config --global user.email "$GH_EMAIL" && git config --global user.name "$GH_NAME"
scripts.ci-deploy: if [ "$TRAVIS_PULL_REQUEST" = "false" ] && [ "$TRAVIS_BRANCH" = "master" ]; then npm run setenv && npm run deploy; fi;
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run build && node tools/deploy.js
